newsitem.title: USA: Physician Sales to buy Rad-Tech X-Ray.
newsitem.headline: Physician Sales to buy Rad-Tech X-Ray.

text.p: Physician Sales & Service Inc said Monday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire Rad-Tech X-Ray Inc of Jonesboro, Ga., in exchange for $6 million of PSS stock.
The deal would be accounted for as a pooling of interests. The price is subject to adjustment

Rad-Tech distributes radiology and imaging equipment, chemicals and supplies, and provides technical service to the acute and alternate site markets through two locations. It serves the Alabama, Mississippi and Tennessee markets. Rad-Tech reported $31 million in revenues for 1996.
As part of the transaction, PSS said it will assume about $4.2 million of outstanding Rad-Tech debt.
PSS said it expects the transaction to be non-dilutive to fiscal 1997 earnings, before any charges related to the merger, and potentially accretive beginning in fiscal 1998.
